info.title: LastMile API
info.description: API for managing customer orders and vehicle types for shipping

post.description:
Example endpoint that processes input data.
Replace this with your actual business logic.

get.description:
Get all customer orders with optional filtering by status

- **skip**: Number of records to skip (for pagination)
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return
- **status**: Filter by order status (pending, confirmed, in_transit, delivered, cancelled)

schema.title: Response Get All Orders Orders  Get

get.description: Get a specific customer order by ID
Get a specific customer order by order number
Get all predictions / recommendations for a specific order

post.description:
Confirm a customer order by assigning a vehicle type.
This updates the order status to 'confirmed' and assigns the specified vehicle.

- **order_id**: The ID of the order to confirm
- **vehicle_type_id**: The ID of the vehicle type to assign

get.description:
Get all orders assigned to a specific vehicle type

- **vehicle_type_id**: The ID of the vehicle type
- **skip**: Number of records to skip (for pagination)
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return

schema.title: Response Get Orders By Vehicle Type Orders By Vehicle Type  Vehicle Type Id  Get

get.description:
Get all vehicle types.

- **skip**: Number of records to skip (pagination)
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return
- **active_only**: If true, only return active vehicle types

schema.title: Response Get Vehicle Types Vehicle Types  Get

get.description: Get a specific vehicle type by ID
Get a specific vehicle type by name

Recommend suitable vehicle types for an order.

- **weight_kg**: Required weight capacity in kilograms
- **volume_m3**: Optional volume capacity in cubic meters

schema.title: Response Recommend Vehicles Vehicle Types Recommend For Order Get

post.description:
Initialize default vehicle types based on the dataset.
This is a one-time setup operation.

schema.title: Response Initialize Default Vehicle Types Vehicle Types Initialize Post

post.description: Trigger a prediction run for open orders. The backend container must have the trained model available at /models/catboost_model.json

schema.title: Response Get All Emissions Vehicle Emissions  Get

get.description: Get all emission records for a specific vehicle type

schema.title: Response Get Emissions By Vehicle Type Vehicle Emissions Vehicle Type  Vehicle Type Id  Get

get.description: Get emission record for a specific vehicle type at a given temperature
Get a specific emission record by ID
Endpoint to retrieve the OpenAPI specification in JSON format
